hero.description: A full-stack engineer passionate about building clean, user-focused digital experiences. I love working with Angular/TS, Spring Boot/Java (Kotlin), combining solid backend architecture with elegant design. Curious and globally minded, I draw inspiration from my travels across Asia and California to create projects that blend technology, culture, and emotion.
